short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Symphony integration with SymphonyChat and MassiveMessages Google Chrome extension for Hubspot

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- REQUIRES Symphony MCM special credentials from your telephone service provider.

WHAT IT DOES

■ Click-to-Dial

Automatically turns all text/link based telephone numbers into click'ables. Otherwise simply highlight any number.. right click, and Dial out.

■ Call Logs

Traverse up to 90 days worth of your call history and associate them with integration results.


■ WEBRTC Phone

Call with the WEBRTC dialer

■ FOR ALL

The Dialer works with any MCM Telecom Symphony Service .


***** PRIVACY POLICY & TERMS OF USE
https://www.mcmtelecom.com/aviso-de-privacidad-clientes-y-proveedores
